T11bsa0551u:3: nanu ko 'yaṃ apoho nāma? kimidaṃ anyasmādapohyate; asmādvā anyadapohyate;
T11bsa0551u:4: asmin vānyadapohyata iti vyutpattyā vijātivyāvṛttaṃ vāhya meva vivakṣitaṃ;
T11bsa0551u:5: buddhyākāro vā; yadi vā apohanaṃ apoha ityanya vyāvṛttimātraṃ iti trayaḥ pakṣāḥ /
T11bsa0551u:6: na tāvadādimau pakṣau, apohanāmnā vidhereva vivakṣitatvāt; antimo
T11bsa0551u:9: yacca pratyakṣavādhitaṃ na tatra sādhanāntarāvakāśa ityatiprasiddham /
T11bsa0551u:10: atha yadyapi nivṛttimahaṃ pratyemīti na vikalpaḥ /
T11bsa0551u:13: tato yathā sāmānyamahaṃ pratyemīti vikalpābhāve 'pi sādhāraṇākāraparisphuraṇāt vikalpabuddhiḥ sāmānyabuddhiḥ pareṣām; tathā nivṛttapratyayā kṣiptā
T11bsa0551u:14: nivṛttibuddhirapohapratītivyavahāramātanotīti cet? nanu sādhāraṇākāraparisphuraṇe vidhirūpatayā yadi sāmānyabodhavyavasthā; tat kimāyātamasphu radabhāvākāre cetasi nivṛttipratītivyavasthāyāḥ tato nivṛttimahaṃ pratyemītyevamākārābhāve 'pi nivṛttyākārasphuraṇaṃ yadi syāt,
T11bsa0551u:16: anyathāsati pratibhāse tatpratītivyavahṛtiriti gavākārepi cetasi turagabodha ityastu /
T11bsa0551u:17: atha viśeṣaṇatayā antarbhūtā nivṛttipratītirityuktaṃ, tathāpi yadyagavāpoḍha itīdṛśā kārovikalpastadā viśeṣaṇatayā tadanupraveśo
T11bsa0551u:19: tadā ca satopi nivṛttilakṣaṇasya viśeṣaṇasya tatrānutkalanāt; kathaṃ tat pratītivyavasthā
T11bsa0551u:25: tasmādvidhyākārāvagrahādadhyakṣavadvikalpasyāpi vidhiviṣayatvameva nānyāpohaviṣayatvamiti kathamapohaḥ śabdārtho ghuṣyate // atrābhidhīyate
T11bsa0551u:29: yattu goḥ pratītau na tadātmāparātmeti sāmarthyādapohaḥ paścānniścīyata iti vidhivādināṃ matam;
T11bsa0551u:30: anyāpohapratītau vā sāmarthyāt anyāpoḍhovadhāryyate iti pratiṣedhavādināṃ matam /
T11bsa0551u:33: na hi vidhiṃ pratīpadya kaścidarthāpattitaḥ paścādapohamavagacchati; apohaṃ vā pratipadyānyāpodam; tasmād goḥ pratipattiriti anyāpoḍhapratipattirucyate /
T11bsa0551u:37: yathā nīlotpale niveśitādindīvaraśabdānnīlotpala pratītau tatkāla eva
T11bsa0551u:43: anyathā yadi śabdādarthapratipattikāle kalito na parāpohaḥ;
T11bsa0551u:47: yadapyavocadvācaspatiḥ; jātimatyo vyaktavyaḥ; vikalpānāṃ śabdānāñca gocaraḥ; tāsāñca tadvatīnāṃ rūpamatajjātīyaparāvṛttamityarthatastadavagaterna gāmbadhāneti co dito
T11bsa0551u:49: tadapyanenaiva nirastaṃ yato jāteradhikāyāḥ prakṣepe 'pi vyaktīnāṃ rūpamatajjātīyavyāvṛttameva cet, tadā tenaiva rūpeṇa
T11bsa0551u:51: atha na vijātīyavyāvṛttaṃ vyaktirūpaṃ, tathāpratītaṃ, vā tadā jātiprasāda
T11bsa0551u:60: na hi sāmānyaṃ nāma sāmānyamātramabhipretam turagepi gośabdasaṅketaprasaṅgāt /
T11bsa0551u:65: tasmāt ekapiṇḍadarśanapūrvvako yaḥ sarvvavyaktisādhāraṇa iva bahiradhya sto vikalpabudhyākāraḥ, tatrāyaṃ gauriti saṅketakaraṇe netaretarāśrayadoṣaḥ /
T11bsa0551u:70: eṣa panthāḥ śrughnamupatiṣṭhata ityatrāpyapoho gamyata eva; aprakṛta pathāntarāpekṣayā eṣa eva /
T11bsa0551u:73: sārthadūtādivyavacchedena panthāeveti pratipadaṃ vyavacchedasya sulabhatvāt tasmādapohadharmmaṇo vidhirūpasya śabdādavagatiḥ; puṇḍarīkaśabdādiva śvetimaviśiṣṭasya padmasya
T11bsa0551u:78: na caivaṃ pratyakṣasyāpyapohaviṣayatvavyavasthā karttumucitā; tasya śābdapratyayasyeva vastuviṣayatve vivādābhāvāt /
T11bsa0551u:89: na hi spaṣṭāspaṣṭe dve rūpe parasparaviruḍdhe ekasya vastunaḥ staḥ; yata ekenendriyabuḍdhau pratibhāsetānyena vikalpe, tathā sati vastuna eva
T11bsa0551u:91: na ca pratibhāsabhedādapara svarūpabhedaḥ; anyathā trailokyamekameva vastu syāt
T11bsa0551u:92: / dūrāsannadeśavarttinoḥ puruṣayoḥ ekatra śākhini spaṣṭāspaṣṭapratibhāsabhedepi na śākhibheda iti cet? na brūmaḥ pratibhāsabhedobhinnavastu niyataḥ /
T11bsa0551u:97: etena yadāha vācaspatiḥ; na ca śabdapratyakṣayovvastugocaratve
T11bsa0551u:102: tanna śābde pratyaye svalakṣaṇam parisphurati kiñca svalakṣaṇātmani vastuni vācye sarvvātmanā pratipatteḥ, vidhiniṣedhayorayogaḥ /
T11bsa0551u:103: tasya hi sadbhāvestīti vyartha, nāstītyasamartham; asadbhāve nāstīti vyarthamastī
T11bsa0551u:106: tasmāt śabdapratibhāsasya vāhyārthabhāvābhāvasādhāraṇyaṃ na tadviṣayatāṃ kṣamate /
T11bsa0551u:107: yacca vācaspatinā jātimabdyaktivācyatāṃ svavācaiva prastu tyānanantarameva na ca śabdārthasya jāterbhāvābhāvasādhāraṇyaṃ nopapadyate; sā hi svarūpato
T11bsa0551u:109: varttamānavyaktisambandhitā hi jāterastitā; atītānāgatavyaktisambandhitā ca nāstiteti
T11bsa0551u:112: jātau bharaṃ nyasyatā svalakṣaṇāvācyatvasya svayaṃ svīkārāt /
T11bsa0551u:115: evaṃ jātimavdhyaktivacane 'pi doṣaḥ; vyakteścet pratītisiddhiḥ, jātiradhikā
T11bsa0551u:116: pratīyatām, mā vā, na tu vyaktipratītidoṣanmuktiḥ /
T11bsa0551u:122: yacceḍhaṃ na ca pratyakṣasyeva śabdānāṃ arthapratyāyanaprakāro yena taddṛṣṭa ivāstyādiśabdāpekṣā na syāt;
T11bsa0551u:123: vicitraśaktitvāt pramāṇānāmiti tadapyaindriyakaśābdapratibhāsayorekasvarūpagrāhitve bhinnāvabhāsadūṣaṇena dūṣitam vicitraśaktitvañca pramāṇānāṃ sākṣātkārādhyavasāyābhyāmapi caritārtham /
T11bsa0551u:124: tato yadi pratyakṣārthapratipādanaṃ śābdena tadvadevāvabhāsaḥ syāt;
T11bsa0551u:126: nanu vṛkṣaśabdena vṛkṣatvāṃśe codite sattvādyaṃśaniścayanārthamastyādipadaprayoga iti cet? niraṃśatvena pratyakṣasamadhigatasya svalakṣaṇasya ko 'vakāśaḥ padāntareṇa;
T11bsa0551u:129: pramāṇāntarāpekṣā dṛṣṭe ti cet? bhavatu tasyāniścayātmatvāt anabhyastasvarūpaviṣaye; vikalpastu svayanniścayātmako yatra grāhī tatra kimapareṇa? asti ca śabdaliṅgāntarāpekṣā tato na vastu svarūpagrahaḥ /
T11bsa0551u:130: nanu bhinnā jātyādayo dharmmāḥ parasparaṃ dharmmiṇaśceti jātilakṣaṇaikadharmmadvāreṇa pratītepi śākhini dharmmāntaravattayā na pratītiriti kinna bhinnā bhidhānādhī no dharmāntarasya nīlacaloccaistaratvāderavavodhaḥ tadetadasaṅgatam; akhaṇḍātmanaḥ svalakṣaṇasya pratyakṣe pratibhāsāt /
T11bsa0551u:131: dṛśyasya dharmmadharmmibhedasya pratyakṣapratikṣiptatvā danyathā sarvvaṃ sarvvatra syādityatiprasaṅgaḥ
T11bsa0551u:136: tathā śabdaliṅgābhyāmapi vācyavācakādi sambandhapratibaddhābhyāṃ dharmmipratipattau niravaśeṣataḍvarmmapratipatti
T11bsa0551u:138: yacca vācaspatiḥ; nacaikopādhinā sattve viśiṣṭe tasmin gṛhīte; upādhyanta raviśiṣṭatabgdrahaḥ
T11bsa0551u:140: natūpādhayo vā viśeṣyatvaṃ vā tasya svabhāva iti /
T11bsa0551u:144: na cāgnidhūmayoḥ kāryyakāraṇabhāva iva svabhāvata eva dharmmadharmmiṇoḥ pratiniyamakalpanamucitam
T11bsa0551u:148: vasturāśigrahaṇaprasañjanamuktam; tadabhiprāyānavagāhana phalam tathā hi tvanmate dharmmadharmmiṇorbhedaḥ upakāralakṣaṇaiva ca pratyāsattiḥ /
T11bsa0551u:150: tat kathaṃ sūryyo pakāryyasya bhinnadeśasya dravyāntarasya vā dṛṣṭavyabhicārasya grahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ saṅgataḥ /
T11bsa0551u:151: tasmāt ekadharmmadvāreṇāpi vastusvarūpapratipattau sarvvātmapratīteḥ; kva śabdāntareṇa vidhiniṣedhāvakāśaḥ
T11bsa0551u:152: asti ca, tasmānna svalakṣaṇasya śabdavikalpaliṅgapratibhāsitvamiti sthitam //
T11bsa0551u:160: tasmādvāsanāvaśādduḍvereva tadātmanā vivarttoyamastu, asadeva vā tadrūpaṃ khyātu; vyaktaya eva vā
T11bsa0551u:162: vabhidhīyatām; sarvvathā nirvviṣayaḥ khalvayaṃ sāmānyapratyayaḥ; kva
T11bsa0551u:163: sāmānyavārttā? yat punaḥ sāmānyābhāve sāmānyapratyayasyākasmikatvamuktaṃ tadayuktam /
T11bsa0551u:165: tadevanna śābdapratyaye jātiḥ pratibhāti; nāpi pratyakṣe na cānumānato 'pi siddhiḥ; adṛśyatve pratibaddhaliṅgādarśanāt /
T11bsa0551u:168: yadāpi piṇḍāntare antarāle vā gobuddherabhāvaṃ darśayet; tadā śāvaleyādisakalagopiṇḍānāmevābhāvādabhāvo go buddherūpapadyamānaḥ kathamarthāntaramākṣipet? gotvādeva gopiṇḍaḥ,
T11bsa0551u:170: yadyevaṃ gopiṇḍādeva gotvamanyathā turagatvamapi gotvam syāt /
T11bsa0551u:171: tasmāt kāraṇaparamparāta eva gopiṇḍo gotvaṃ tu bhavatu mā vā /
T11bsa0551u:174: atha bhinnaṃ tadā tadeva sāmānyam nāmni paraṃ vivāda iti cet? abhinnaiva sā śaktiḥ prati vastu; yathātvekaḥ śaktasvabhāvo bhāvaḥ tatha anyopi bhavan
T11bsa0551u:177: tathāsmākaṃ vyaktirapi jātinirapekṣā svarūpeṇaiva bhinnā hetuḥ /
T11bsa0551u:179: aśvatvagotvā dīnāṃ sāmānya viśeṣāṇāṃ svāśraye samavāyaḥ
T11bsa0551u:184: iheti buddheḥ samavāyasiddhiriheti dhīśca dvayadarśane syāt /
T11bsa0551u:186: etena yeyaṃ pratyayānuvṛttiranuvṛttavastvanuyāyinī kathamatyantabhedinīsu vyaktiṣu vyāvṛttaviṣayapratyayabhāvānupātinīṣu bhavitumarhatītyuhāpravarttanamasya pratyākhyātam /
T11bsa0551u:188: yat punaranena viparyyaye vādhakamuktam, abhidhānapratyayānuvṛttiḥ kutaścinnivṛttya kvacideva bhavantī nimittavatī /
T11bsa0551u:191: tasmāt, tulya bhede yayā jā tiḥ pratyāsattyā
T11bsa0551u:195: yayā pratyāsattyā daṇḍasūtrādikaṃ prasarpati kvacinnānyatra saiva pratyāsattiḥ puruṣasphaṭikādiṣu daṇḍisūtritvādivyavahāranibandhanamastu kiṃ
T11bsa0551u:200: tadyadīdaṃ parikalpanīyam tadā varam pratyāsattireva sāmānyapratyayahetuḥ parikalpyatām, kiṃ gurvyāparikalpanayetyabhiprāyā parijñānāt /
T11bsa0551u:216: svarūpavān ghaṭa ityādivat gotvajātimā n piṇḍa iti parikalpitam bhedamupādāya viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvasyeṣṭatvādgovyāvṛttānubhavabhāvitvād gaurayamiti vyavahārasya /
T11bsa0551u:218: vādhakaṃ ca sāmānyaguṇakarmmādyupā dhicakrasya, kevalavyaktigrāhakaṃ paṭupratyakṣam /
T11bsa0551u:222: tatra na budhyākārasya tattvataḥ sambṛttyā vā vidhiniṣedhau /
T11bsa0551u:225: nāpi tattvato vāhyasyāpi vidhiniṣedhau tasya śābde pratyaye 'pratibhāsanāt /
T11bsa0551u:226: ataeva sarvvadharmmāṇāntattvato 'nabhilāpyatvaṃ pratibhāsādhyavasāyābhāvāt tasmāt vāhyasyaiva sāmbṛtau vidhiniṣedhau /
T11bsa0551u:230: vahireva hi saṃvṛttyā saṃvṛtyāpi tu nākṛteḥ //
T11bsa0551u:233: nanvadhyavasāye yadyadhyavaseyaṃ vastu na sphurati tadā tadadhyavasitamiti ko 'rthaḥ? apratibhāse 'pi pravṛttiviṣayīkṛtamiti yo 'rthaḥ /
T11bsa0551u:235: cet? ucyate; yadyapi viśvamagṛhītaṃ tathāpi vikalpasya niyatasāmagrīprasūtatvena niyatākāratayā niyataśaktitvāt niyatā eva
T11bsa0551u:241: yenākāre vāhyasya vāhye vā ākārasyāropadvāreṇa dūṣaṇāvakāśaḥ /
T11bsa0551u:242: kintarhi svavāsanāvipākavaśādupajāyamānaiva buḍvirapaśyantyapi vāhyaṃ vāhye vṛttimātano tīti viplutaiva /
T11bsa0551u:244: sa eva cāpohaśabdavācyaḥ śabdānāmarthaḥ pravṛttinivṛttiviṣayaśceti sthitam //
T11bsa0551u:254: cānaikāntikaḥ; tathāhi śabdānāmadhyavasitavijātivyāvṛttava stumātraviṣayatvamanicchadbhiḥ paraiḥ paramārthato
T11bsa0551u:255: vācyaṃ svalakṣaṇamupādhirupādhiyogaḥ sopādhirastu yadi vā kṛtirastu buddheḥ, gatyantarābhāvāt
T11bsa0551u:260: viṣayavattvalakṣaṇasya vyāpakasya nivṛttau vipakṣato nivarttamānam vācakatvamadhyavasitavāhyaviṣayatvena vyāpyata iti vyāptisiddhiḥ /
T11bsa0551u:262: arthaścaiko 'dhyāsato bhāsato 'nyaḥ sthāpyo vācyastattvato naiva kaścit //
T11bsa0551u:266: tatrādṛḍhe sarvvamayatnaśīrṇaṃ dṛḍhe tu sausthyannanu tāvataiva //
